item.title: How deals with Apple and Trump’s Pentagon turned rare earth miner MP Materials into a red-hot stock
item.description: MP Materials aims to build a U.S. rare-earths-and-magnets supply chain that can eventually compete with China.

item.title: What CEOs really think about Nvidia and AMD’s China export deal: ‘Brilliant, a tariff that we don’t have to pay’
item.description: Also: All the news and watercooler chat from Fortune.

item.title: Southeast Asia’s cities at ‘high risk’ of flooding and heatwaves, thanks to climate change
item.description: Bangkok, Jakarta, and Manila are among the cities facing at least a "high risk" of extreme rain and heatwaves, according to Zurich Resilience Solution...

item.title: Trump says Intel CEO has ‘amazing story,’ sets Cabinet talks
item.description: "Mr. Tan and my Cabinet members are going to spend time together, and bring suggestions to me during the next week."

item.title: Exclusive: Fintech giant Stripe building ‘Tempo’ blockchain with crypto VC Paradigm
item.description: Stripe’s newest push into crypto comes as the company has made an aggressive push into stablecoins.
